document_data.editor: Melissa Holm, Greg Marks, Toni Winslow-Brill
document_data.mainbody:
Pipyaps Guide to All of the Nine Hells is a 5th edition lorebook of the Nine Hells written from the perspective of Pipyap, an imp, who has appeared in several Adventurers League adventure modules. It is intended to be a companion for Baldurs Gate Descent into Avernus and the 9th season of Adventurers League Avernus Rising.
